title: Черчилль
overview: Boris Ermolaevich Cheryshev had in College called Churchill - not only for some resemblance to the English Prime Minister, but also for the extraordinary intelligence and intuition. These qualities helped him to rise quickly through the ranks of the foreign Ministry.Blown up by terrorists in a London pub bomb completely changes the life of a successful diplomat. The pension is of a brilliant career, a wheelchair is the chair of the Ambassador's spyglass as the only window to the world.To Boris Ermolaevich often seek the help of former colleagues - Churchill excellent. When he was untangling the subtle intrigue of international politics, but now, observing the neighboring houses, he solves the mysteries and solves crimes. He helped his nephew Sava, a young doctor, Svetlana and Kostya operative.
